str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.
Probably another form of biazo; to squeeze, i.e. Seize (press), or officially (arrest), or in hunting (capture).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
